alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:10PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Orange County through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middletown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Monroe, Goshen, Howells, Chester, Montgomery, Florida, Harriman, Cuddebackville, Otisville, Unionville, Kiryas Joel, Woodbury, Scotchtown and Mechanicstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
